name: ext_R4B_MedicationRequest_di_initialFill
title: Cross-version Extension for R4B.MedicationRequest.dispenseRequest.initialFill for use in FHIR R2
description: This cross-version extension represents MedicationRequest.dispenseRequest.initialFill from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicationRequest|4.3.0 for use in FHIR R2.

element.definition: Indicates the quantity or duration for the first dispense of the medication.
unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references).

element.definition: The amount or quantity to provide as part of the first dispense.
element.comment: The context of use may frequently define what kind of quantity this is and therefore what kind of units can be used. The context of use may also restrict the values for the comparator.

constraint.human: If a code for the unit is present, the system SHALL also be present
The comparator is not used on a SimpleQuantity

mapping.map: PQ, IVL<PQ>, MO, CO, depending on the values
